model_answer: The narrator says: 'nothing beats a good thunderstorm these clouds contain a lot of water in liquid and even solid form rain and hail this lesson is about the types of precipitation that can form and how they form we will look at the phases in which water can occur gas liquid and solid and how water transforms from one state to another.'
